title: Is the future of medical imaging a good topic for research? - Quora

response.answer_text: Absolutely. This is an area of intense and ongoing interest for diagnostics and intervention. MICCAI (Medical Image Computing and Computer Assisted Intervention Society) is the leading organization in this area. Check their website at Medical Image Computing and Computer Assisted Intervention  for further information. Read some of the annual conference proceedings to see what is current and what has been addressed in the past. This will also help you develop a list of researchers to understand who is doing what.
